alfredsnippet.snippet:
"While it may be the conventional wisdom that Einstein had finally got the workings of the universe right, the history of science strongly suggests that this is presumptuous and highly unlikely"

- Petrosky, H., "To engineer is human. The role of failure in successful design", Vintage Books, New York, 1992
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Acceptance of Relativity is Presumptuous and Highly Unlikely to Prove Accurate
